text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff... Huff...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey, hey, Taishin! Come on, let's<n>train!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
We promised to race in the Derby! So<n>I really think it'd be
cool to train<n>together for it.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff... Huff...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Heeey! You listening?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ugh! Quit bothering me!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
I told you I don't need you to worry<n>about me! I'm all good,
so just focus<n>on your own races! Dummy!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uwaaagh! She called me a dummyyy!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I can picture it clearly. Were you<n>pestering her?

We're all here after Winning Ticket<n>calls an emergency
meeting on how to<n>help Narita Taishin following her loss.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But I reeeally wanted to make her<n>feel better! Because I
wanna race in<n>the Derby together!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You don't need to explain—I<n>understand what you were
thinking.<n>Naturally, Taishin does as well.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Whaaa... You really think she gets it?<n>Even though she
called me a dummy?

As Biwa Hayahide says, Narita<n>Taishin knows that Winning
Ticket<n>wants to race in the Derby together.

And her brushing off Winning<n>Ticket's attempts must mean
one<n>thing...
choice_data_list:
She pushed you away because she wants to race
together too.

She pushed you away because she wants to race
together too.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Yes, that's precisely it. We're all<n>rivals who promised to
race in the<n>Derby together.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Rivals on the track, besties off<n>it!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Then you understand that cooperating<n>isn't everything.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uuuh... Uuuuummm... Actually, not<n>really!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower was trying to catch up to<n>Mihono Bourbon
forever... until she<n>finally beat her in the Kikuka Sho.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
So you don't always have to run by<n>your rivals' side.
Sometimes running<n>ahead can motivate them too.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
So you don't always have to run by<n>your rivals' side.
Sometimes running<n>ahead can motivate them too.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Run... ahead...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Seeing you win after consecutive<n>races was rousing for
both me and<n>Taishin.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: No words need be spoken. Just keep<n>running ahead.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I get it... Taishin doesn't want us toslow down. She's trying hard to runwith us!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Okay! I'm gonna run like crazy! I'll go<n>nonstop 'cause I
know Taishin'll<n>catch up!

Later at night, the sound of swift<n>footsteps can be heard on
the training<n>course.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff... Huff...

Winning Ticket is training on her own<n>to be able to run
ahead of her rivals.

As I look on at the dedicated racer, a<n>second, and then a
third set of<n>footsteps join in.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff... Huff...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff... Huff...

They didn't plan to meet here. It<n>happened by chance
because they<n>each felt the same thing at the same<n>time.

Without a word, the three continue<n>running. But their
overlapping<n>footsteps sound like a fiery exchange<n>
between rivals.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Sigh... Students using the trainingcourse after hours is a no-no. What todo?
choice_data_list: Would you mind overlooking it this one time?

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Hehe, if I must. I insist you look after<n>them though.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
I wouldn't dream of getting in the<n>way during this important
time in their<n>lives. ♪

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff, huff, puff...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Hmph... Huff, puff, huff...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ugh! Huff, huff, huff...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah! Rrrnnngh!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Ngh! Hraaah!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hey! Hwaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: The Three
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff, huff, puff...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: What're you running so seriously<n>for?! Dummy!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: You were running serious first!<n>Actually, Hayahide started it!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Because Taishin overtook me!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huh? Did not! Ticket was the one<n>who shot off first!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Don't lie! Grrr!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Pft... Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey, why'd you turn the other way?<n>Are you laughing?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Heh-heh... Hahaha!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ehehe... Ahahaha!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I wonder if the sky will be this clear<n>on the day of the Derby.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Geez... All you ever think about is the<n>Derby.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, it's the big race I've always<n>dreamed of running. It
brings together<n>everyone who shares the same<n>dream.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Everyone there pushes themselves<n>to the limit through the
entire 2,400<n>meters—all to get the greatest glory<n>there is.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Just watching it gets my heart going...<n>I wanna get out there
on that turf and<n>win it.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I... have someone I want to beat as<n>much as I want to
defeat you two. And<n>I have to get better to do it.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
How I see it, a Derby win won't only<n>give me renown, but it
will also act as<n>proof of my abilities. Thus, I will<n>accept
nothing less than victory.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
As for me, people have been<n>expecting me to fail since
before I<n>even got into the academy.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
I haven't been getting the wins, so<n>it's not crazy for them
to think that,<n>but it sucks being known for it. It<n>makes me
fed up with myself.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
So I wanna show them. I'll win the<n>Derby and prove I'm
not a weakling.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Then let's run together! Because all<n>of us wanna win the
Derby no matter<n>what!
